item.title: Apply for access to a GWS
item.description:
This article explains how to apply for access to a GWS from the JASMIN Accounts Portal.

Step 1: Sign in to the JASMIN Accounts Portal  and select ‘Manage JASMIN services’ to navigate to the JASMIN Services page. From the ‘Discover Services’ menu on the left, select ‘Group Workspaces’.
